Frequently Asked Questions

Can I cancel at anytime?

Yes. You can cancel anytime, no questions asked. However, we would highly appreciate if you will give us some feedback so we can improve.

Is there a free trial?

Yes. Yes there is a 14 day free trial of the paid plans. You can cancel your subscription at any time during the trial period for a full refund.

What is your refund policy?

We offer a 14 day free trial of the premium plans. You can cancel any time during your trial for a full refund. After the trial period, all sales are final.

How secure is {{ site.brand.name }}?

Very secure. Protecting the data you trust to {{ site.brand.name }} is our first priority. We use secure third-party services like PayPal & Stripe to process all payments.
